structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: The compact administrator, subject to the approval of the secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet, may make or arrange for any payments necessary to discharge any financial obligations imposed upon this state by the compact or by any supplementary agreement entered into thereunder.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2). -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 4, effective June 19, 1958.
